1000.mdt
AGEAR TOWN		02 0B 3B 68 03 10 2E 02 09 04 01 05 00 08 07 00 05 08 0C 01 00 04 3F 10 00 0A 00 00 34 00 10 02 00 0B 3A 68 03 10 4A 02 
DURHAM CAVE 1	02 00 00 00 00 00 0B 3D 68 03 10 9B 02 08 07 00 05 08 0C 01 00 04 3F 09 04 E1 04 00 03 10 78 02 09 04 01 06 00 10 00 0B 00 00 38 00 10 02 09 04 41 06 00 08 09 41 00 03 10 8E 02 10 00 0B 00 00 38 00 10 02 09 04 01 06 00 10 00 0C 00 20 38 00 10 02 00 00 00 00 0B 3C 68 03 10 BB 02 

3810.mdt	BAKED PLAINS 2
Map transitions to BAKED PLAINS 3, HTA index 30 and 31(appears to be index 30 that starts the transition, 31 that gives the dialogue box of next location)
Map transitions to BAKED PLAINS 2:
00 38 00 00  00 80 A2 C4  00 00 C8 42  00 C0 5A 45  00 00 00 00  00 00 34 43  FD FF 01 00  FF FF FF FF
20 38 00 00  00 20 00 45  00 00 02 44  00 A0 5C C5  00 00 34 43  00 00 00 00  FD FF 01 00  FF FF FF FF


BAKED PLAINS 2 --> BAKED PLAINS 3	(index 30 and 31)
Map Transition		00 00 01 00  00 00 00 00  01 00 30 2C  00 00 00 00  00 00 C8 44  00 00 C8 43  00 40 83 C5  00 60 1F 45  00 00 48 44  00 80 6D C5  00 00 FA 44  00 00 07 44  00 40 67 C5  00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00  00 00 00 00
